{
  "explanation": "The description states that the Hotjar cookie is used to persist the random user ID to ensure that behavior in subsequent visits to the same site will be attributed to the same user ID. This aligns with the purpose of 'Service Usage Analytics' as it involves collecting and analyzing user behavior over time to provide insights on service usage. Additionally, it's related to 'Service Personalisation' because it helps tailor the user experience based on their past behavior. No other purposes seem to fit the description provided.",

}
```
